articles.author: Barbara Starr, CNN Pentagon Correspondent
articles.title: Taliban members escorted Americans to gates at Kabul airport in secret arrangement with US - CNN
articles.description: The US military negotiated a secret arrangement with the Taliban that resulted in Taliban members escorting groups of Americans to the gates of the Kabul airport as they sought to escape Afghanistan, according to two defense officials.
